meanings.sent1: The store offers multisize shirts for all customers.
meanings.sent2: I bought a multisize pack of socks that fit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The multisize shoes made the clown look even sillier!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of multisize hats was like a rainbow on her shelf.
meanings.sent5: The multisize options made shopping for jeans much easier.

meanings.definition: To make available in multiple sizes.
meanings.sent1: They multisize their clothing to cater to various body types.
meanings.sent2: I will multisize the posters for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: He decided to multisize the cupcakes for the party to avoid any complaints.
meanings.sent4: She likes to multisize her artwork to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent5: The company chose to multisize their products to meet customer demands.
